H0.text: What is the largest (by population) landlocked country. Kazakhstan

H1.text: What is the largest (by population) landlocked country. Uzbekistan

H2.text: What is the largest (by population) landlocked country. Afghanistan

H3.text: What is the largest (by population) landlocked country. FDRE

A4.text: Kazakhstan has a population of 20 million and one of the lowest population densities in the world, with fewer than 6 people per square kilometre.

A5.text: Kazakhstan is the ninth-largest country by land area and the largest landlocked country.

A6.text: The country has a population of more than 38.2 million, making it the most populous country in Central Asia.

A7.text: Uzbekistan is a doubly landlocked country located in Central Asia.
